text: Guillermo Sepúlveda Rodríguez (29 November 1934 - 19 May 2021) was a Mexican football defender. He played for Mexico in the 1958 and 1962 FIFA World Cups. He also played for C.D. Guadalajara. Sepúlveda died on 19 May 2021 in Mexico City, aged 86.Murió Guillermo “Tigre” Sepúlveda, legendario defensa de las Chivas de Guadalajara ==References== ==Other websites== *FIFA profile Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican footballers
title: Guillermo Sepúlveda
